rows.label: qst103617_msg0001
rows.name:
I heard from the senator that the
capital's guard would be thin... At
this rate, we'll be annihilated!

rows.label: qst103617_msg0002
rows.name:
You all... how long will you
continue to interfere?!

rows.label: qst103617_msg0003
rows.name:
Wait! A senator... A member
of the Imperial Council?

rows.label: qst103617_msg0004
rows.name:
That's right... A man named Stol
from the Imperial Council.

rows.label: qst103617_msg0005
rows.name:
The soldiers we gathered were worn
down by Akatsuki's orders...

rows.label: qst103617_msg0006
rows.name:
And all our leaders were killed
by you! Brionac is destroyed!

rows.label: qst103617_msg0007
rows.name:
It was he who gave us the
information on the Brionac leaders.

rows.label: qst103617_msg0008
rows.name:
It was Akatsuki who designated
the transaction locations for
the leaders... That bastard...!

rows.label: qst103617_msg0009
rows.name:
Akatsuki mentioned something
about being from Lindwurm before
returning to his Core Crystal.

rows.label: qst103617_msg0010
rows.name:
Lindwurm... So they were
connected behind the scenes!!

rows.label: qst103617_msg0011
rows.name:
So Senator Stol and Akatsuki
are members of Lindwurm...

rows.label: qst103617_msg0012
rows.name:
In that case, this attack
was a diversion for him to
escape from the Empire...

rows.label: qst103617_msg0013
rows.name: That senator... He made a fool of us!!

rows.label: qst103617_msg0014
rows.name:
Then there is no reason to
fight. Let us reconcile...

rows.label: qst103617_msg0015
rows.name: Silence! Have you forgotten our goal?!

rows.label: qst103617_msg0016
rows.name:
With the last of Brionac's
strength, we will crush
the Empire's Blade!!
